content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Hassan, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for considering my apartment for your rental needs. As a landlord, I am eager to ensure that I am getting the highest possible rental price for my property. May I ask what your budget is for renting this apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 700 Euros per month. Please let me know if that's not enough.

Also, I want to be on good terms with you as my landlord. That's why I am being very reasonable and willing to negotiate.

I would like to know if you have any other requirements or conditions for renting the apartment.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for letting me know about your budget, Hassan. While I understand that you want to be reasonable and willing to negotiate, I must say that my rental price for this apartment is 800 Euros per month. However, I am open to discussing the terms and conditions of the rental agreement, such as the length of the lease and any additional fees that may apply. Is there anything else you would like to discuss or negotiate?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand. That is higher than my budget, but I am open to discussing the terms and conditions. Can you tell me more about the length of the lease?

Also, are there any additional fees that I should be aware of?

If this is not within my budget, I can look for another apartment. Thank you for your understanding.

I would appreciate it if you could provide a written copy of the rental agreement for me to review before signing.

Lastly, if I decide to accept the rental price proposed by you, I will sign the rental agreement and pay the security deposit upfront.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for your response, Hassan. The length of the lease for this apartment is one year, with the option to renew for another year. As for additional fees, there will be a security deposit of two months' rent due upfront, and a monthly maintenance fee of 50 Euros.

If you decide to accept the rental price proposed by me, I can provide you with a written copy of the rental agreement for your review. Once you have signed the agreement and paid the security deposit, you can move into the apartment.

I appreciate your understanding and willingness to negotiate. If you have any further questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask.
name: Heinrich Heine
